name: Chuek Chuek
description:
Chuek Chuek Where did the game name come from? :

     There is 1 member of the team, who heard the sound effect during battle like stabbing a friend with a sword, and that sound pretty funny when you play with your friend, so she came up with the idea of naming the game Chuek Chuek.

HOW TO PLAY :
  • When PLAYER presses the “Play” button, the system will ask for the PLAYER's name, and after pressing the "Confirm" button, the system will bring PLAYER to the battle area that supports up to 20 players.
  • PLAYER has to fight against other players who enter the battle zone.
  • When PLAYER dies, PLAYER has to wait 5 seconds to randomly respawn in the battle zone.
  • There is no time limit, so when PLAYER wants to stop playing, there is a button to leave the room on the top right of the screen.

----------------------------------------------------

CONTROLLER :
  • W A S D : Move 
  • Shift : Sprint 
  • Left Mouse : Attack 
  • Hold Right Mouse : Rotate Camera 
  • Scroll Wheel : Zoom In - Out
